TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract Table

summary.span: 代表单个表格。

span.span: Represents a single table.

para.span: Table对象是集合的一个成员 。

span.span: The Table object is a member of the collection.

para.span: Tables 集合包含指定选定区域、范围或文档中的所有表格。

span.span: The Tables collection includes all the tables in the specified selection, range, or document.

para.span: 使用Tables（ ），其中 是索引号，返回一个Table对象。

span.span: Use Tables(), where is the index number, to return a single Table object.

para.span: 索引号代表表格在所选内容、范围或文档中的位置。

span.span: The index number represents the position of the table in the selection, range, or document.

para.span: 使用 方法可在指定范围添加表格。

span.span: Use the method to add a table at the specified range.

summary.span: 使 Microsoft Word 可以自动调整表格中的单元格的大小以适应内容。

span.span: Allows Microsoft Word to automatically resize cells in a table to fit their contents.

summary.span: 允许跨页断行的指定的表格中的 Microsoft Word。

span.span: Allows Microsoft Word to break the specified table across pages.

summary.span: 返回一个 代表 Microsoft Word 应用程序的对象。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the Microsoft Word application.

summary.span: 返回或设置 Boolean 值，该值表示如果所应用的预置表样式为列提供了样式带，则是否对表中的列应用样式带。

span.span: Returns or sets a Boolean that represents whether to apply style bands to the columns in a table if an applied preset table style provides style banding for columns.

summary.span: 读/写。

span.span: Read/write.

span.span: The name of the style to apply.

summary.span: 应用指定的样式，但保留用户直接应用的所有格式。

span.span: Applies the specified style but maintains any formatting that a user directly applies.

summary.span: 真正 的 Microsoft Word，以便第一列将格式应用于指定表格的第一列。

span.span: True for Microsoft Word to apply first-column formatting to the first column of the specified table.

para.span: 指定的表格样式必须包含第一列的格式，才能将此格式应用于表格。

span.span: The specified table style must contain first-column formatting in order to apply this formatting to a table.

summary.span: 真正 的 Microsoft Word 标题行格式应用于所选表的第一行。

span.span: True for Microsoft Word to apply heading-row formatting to the first row of the selected table.

para.span: 指定的表格样式必须包含标题行格式，才能将此格式应用于表格。

span.span: The specified table style must contain heading-row formatting in order to apply this formatting to a table.

member this.ApplyStyleLastColumn : bool with get, set

summary.span: 如果为 True，则 Microsoft Word 对指定表格的最后一列应用最后一列的格式。

span.span: True for Microsoft Word to apply last-column formatting to the last column of the specified table.

para.span: 指定的表格样式必须包含最后一列的格式，才能将此格式应用于表格。

span.span: The specified table style must contain last-column formatting in order to apply this formatting to a table.

member this.ApplyStyleLastRow : bool with get, set

summary.span: 真正 的 Microsoft Word，以便将应用最后一行的最后一个格式指定表中的行。

span.span: True for Microsoft Word to apply last-row formatting to the last row of the specified table.

para.span: 指定的表格样式必须包含最后一行的格式，才能将此格式应用于表格。

span.span: The specified table style must contain last-row formatting in order to apply this formatting to a table.

summary.span: 返回或设置一个 boolean 类型的值 ，该值代表是否如果应用的预置的表样式为提供了样式带行到表中的行应用样式带。读/写。

span.span: Returns or sets a Boolean that represents whether to apply style bands to the rows in a table if an applied preset table style provides style banding for rows. Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AutoFitBehavior([in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdAutoFitBehavior Behavior) runtime managed

param.name: Behavior

span.span: Required .

param.span: Word 如何使用自动调整功能来调整指定表格的大小。可以是下列WdAutoFitBehavior常量之一： wdAutoFitContentwdAutoFitWindowwdAutoFitFixed

span.span: How Word resizes the specified table with the AutoFit feature is used.Can be one of these WdAutoFitBehavior constants: wdAutoFitContentwdAutoFitWindowwdAutoFitFixed

summary.span: 确定 Microsoft Word 如何使用自动调整功能来调整表格的大小。

span.span: Determines how Microsoft Word resizes a table when the AutoFit feature is used.

para.span: Word 可以根据表格单元格的内容或文档窗口的宽度重新调整表格的大小。也可使用本方法来关闭"自动调整"功能。这样，表格的大小是固定值，而不随单元格内容或窗口宽度而改变。

span.span: Word can resize the table based on the content of the table cells or the width of the document window. You can also use this method to turn off AutoFit so that the table size is fixed, regardless of cell contents or window width.

para.span: 将自动调整行为设置为wdAutoFitContent或wdAutoFitWindow 如果该属性当前为 False，则将其设置为True 。

span.span: Setting the AutoFit behavior to wdAutoFitContent or wdAutoFitWindow sets the property to True if it's currently False.

para.span: 同样，如果将自动调整行为设置为wdAutoFitFixed ，则将AllowAutoFit属性设置为False （如果当前为 True）。

span.span: Likewise, setting the AutoFit behavior to wdAutoFitFixed sets the AllowAutoFit property to False if it's currently True.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Creator As Integer
public: property int Creator { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 32 位整数，它指示在其中创建指定的对象的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the specified object was created.

para.span: 如果对象是在 Microsoft Word 中创建的，则此属性返回十六进制数字是4d535744，表示字符串 "MSWD"。

span.span: If the object was created in Microsoft Word, this property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string "MSWD."

para.span: [!注释] 此值还可以通过常量 wdCreatorCode 表示。

span.span: This value can also be represented by the constant wdCreatorCode.

para.span: Creator属性主要用于在 Macintosh 上使用，其中每个应用程序都有一个四字符创建者代码。

span.span: The Creator property was primarily designed to be used on the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code.

para.span: 例如，Microsoft Word 提供了 MSWD 的创建者代码。

span.span: For example, Microsoft Word has the creator code MSWD.

para.span: 有关此属性的其他信息，请参阅语言参考 Microsoft Office Macintosh 版本所附带的帮助。

span.span: For additional information about this property, consult the language reference Help included with Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition.

member this.Descr : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，该字符串包含指定表的说明。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that contains a description for the specified table.
A description for the specified table.

para.span: 读/写。

span.span: Read/write.

para.span: 使用此属性可提供表格的替代文本说明。

span.span: Use this property to provide an alternative text description for a table.

para.span: 此属性将文本添加到 Microsoft Word 2010 中 "表格属性" 对话框的 "可选文字" 选项卡上的 "说明" 文本框中。

span.span: This property adds text to the Description text box on the Alt Text tab of the Table Properties dialog box in Microsoft Word 2010.

para.span: 警告： Web 浏览器在加载表格或缺少表格时显示可选文字。

span.span: Caution: Web browsers display alternative text while tables are loading or if they are missing.

para.span: Web 搜索引擎利用可选文字帮助查找网页。

span.span: Web search engines use the alternative text to help find Web pages.

para.span: 可选文字也可用来帮助残障人士。

span.span: Alternative text is also used to assist disabilities.

member this.ID : string with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置指定对象的标识标签当前文档保存为 Web 页时。

span.span: Returns or sets the identifying label for the specified object when the current document is saved as a Web page.

para.span: 除 对象之外，您可以将标签用作来自其他网页或当前文档中的超链接引用。

span.span: With the exception of the object, you can use a label as a hyperlink reference from other Web pages or from within the current document.

member this.LeftPadding : single with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置要添加的单个单元格或表格中的所有单元格的内容左侧的间距 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: Returns or sets the amount of space (in points) to add to the left of the contents of a single cell or all the cells in a table.

para.span: 单个单元格的 LeftPadding 属性设置将覆盖整个表的 LeftPadding 属性设置。

span.span: The setting of the LeftPadding property for a single cell overrides the setting of the LeftPadding property for the entire table.

summary.span: 返回指定表格的嵌套层。

span.span: Returns the nesting level of the specified table.

para.span: 最外围表格的嵌套层为 1。

span.span: The outermost table has a nesting level of 1.

para.span: 每一个相连嵌套表格的嵌套层比其前面表格的嵌套层高 1。

span.span: The nesting level of each successively nested table is one higher than the previous table.

span.span: Returns or sets the preferred width (in points or as a percentage of the window width) for the specified cell, cells, columns, or table.

para.span: 如果该 属性设置为wdPreferredWidthPoints，则PreferredWidth属性返回或设置宽度（以磅为单位）。

span.span: If the property is set to wdPreferredWidthPoints, the PreferredWidth property returns or sets the width in points.

para.span: 如果将 PreferredWidthType 属性设置为 wdPreferredWidthPercent ， PreferredWidth 属性返回或设置宽度为窗口宽度的百分比。

span.span: If the PreferredWidthType property is set to wdPreferredWidthPercent, the PreferredWidth property returns or sets the width as a percentage of the window width.

summary.span: 对指定的表格进行排序。

span.span: Sorts the specified table.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SortAscending() runtime managed

summary.span: 按字母数字升序顺序对表行进行排序。

span.span: Sorts table rows in ascending alphanumeric order.

para.span: 将表格第一行视为域名记录，不包含在排序中。

span.span: The first table row is considered a header record and isn't included in the sort.

para.span: 使用 方法将域名记录包含在排序中。

span.span: Use the method to include the header record in a sort.

para.span: 注释 此方法提供针对包含数据列的邮件合并数据源进行排序的一种简化形式。

span.span: Note This method offers a simplified form of sorting intended for mail merge data sources that contain columns of data.

para.span: 对于大多数排序任务，请使用 方法。

span.span: For most sorting tasks, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SortDescending() runtime managed

summary.span: 以字母数字降序排列表格行。

span.span: Sorts table rows in descending alphanumeric order.

para.span: 第一个段落或表格行被视为域名记录，不包含在排序中。

span.span: The first paragraph or table row is considered a header record and isn't included in the sort.

para.span: 使用 方法将域名记录包含在排序中。

span.span: Use the method to include the header record in a sort.

para.span: 注释 此方法提供针对包含数据列的邮件合并数据源进行排序的一种简化形式。

span.span: Note This method offers a simplified form of sorting intended for mail-merge data sources that contain columns of data.

para.span: 对于大多数排序任务，请使用 方法。

span.span: For most sorting tasks, use the method.

summary.span: 返回或设置表格中单元格之间的间距 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: Returns or sets the spacing (in points) between the cells in a table.

Public Function Split (ByRef BeforeRow As Object) As Table

param.name: BeforeRow

span.span: Required Object.
The row that the table is to be split before.

param.span: 可以是行号或 对象。

span.span: Can be a row number or a object.

summary.span: 在表中指定行的正上方插入一个空段落，并返回一个 对象，其中包含指定行和其后的行。

span.span: Inserts an empty paragraph immediately above the specified row in the table, and returns a object that contains both the specified row and the rows that follow it.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ Style { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };
member this.Style : obj with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置指定对象的样式。

span.span: Returns or sets the style for the specified object.

para.span: 若要设置该属性，请指定样式的本地名称、一个整数、一个 常量或一个代表样式的对象。

span.span: To set this property, specify the local name of the style, an integer, a constant, or an object that represents the style.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdTableDirection TableDirection { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdTableDirection get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdTableDirection value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置 Microsoft Word 对指定表格中的单元格进行排序的方向。

span.span: Returns or sets the direction in which Microsoft Word orders cells in the specified table.

para.span: 可以是下列常量之一：

span.span: can be one of the following constants:

para.span: TableDirection 属性设置为 wdTableDirectionLtr ，如果所选的行进行排列第一列中的最左边的位置。 TableDirection 属性设置为 wdTableDirectionRtl ，如果所选的行进行排列第一列中最右边的位置。

span.span: If the TableDirection property is set to wdTableDirectionLtr, the selected rows are arranged with the first column in the leftmost position. If the TableDirection property is set to wdTableDirectionRtl, the selected rows are arranged with the first column in the rightmost position.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Tables As Tables
public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::Tables ^ Tables { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::Tables ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 集合，该集合代表指定表格中的所有表格。

span.span: Returns a collection that represents all the tables in the specified table.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Title : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，该字符串包含指定表的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that contains a title for the specified table.
A title for the specified table.

para.span: 读/写。

span.span: Read/write.

para.span: 使用此属性可为表格提供可选文字标题。

span.span: Use this property to provide an alternative text title for a table.

para.span: 此属性将标题文本添加到 Microsoft Word 2010 中 "表格属性" 对话框的 "可选文字" 选项卡上的 "标题" 文本框中。

span.span: This property adds title text to the Title text box on the Alt Text tab of the Table Properties dialog box in Microsoft Word 2010.

para.span: 警告： Web 浏览器在加载表格或缺少表格时显示可选文字。

span.span: Caution: Web browsers display alternative text while tables are loading or if they are missing.

para.span: Web 搜索引擎利用可选文字帮助查找网页。

span.span: Web search engines use the alternative text to help find Web pages.

para.span: 可选文字也可用来帮助残障人士。

span.span: Alternative text is also used to assist disabilities.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float TopPadding { float get(); void set(float value); };
member this.TopPadding : single with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置单个单元格或表格中的所有单元格的内容上方要增加的间距 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: Returns or sets the amount of space (in points) to add above the contents of a single cell or all the cells in a table.

para.span: 单个单元格的 TopPadding 属性设置将覆盖整个表的 TopPadding 属性设置。

span.span: The setting of the TopPadding property for a single cell overrides the setting of the TopPadding property for the entire table.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Uniform As Boolean
public: property bool Uniform { bool get(); };

summary.span: 如此 如果表中的所有行都具有相同的列数。

span.span: True if all the rows in a table have the same number of columns.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void UpdateAutoFormat() runtime managed

summary.span: 使用预定义表格式对表格式进行更新。

span.span: Updates the table with the characteristics of a predefined table format.

para.span: 如果您应用表格格式， 然后插入行和列，则该表可能不再与预定义的外观相匹配。

span.span: If you apply a table format with and then insert rows and columns, the table may no longer match the predefined look.

para.span: UpdateAutoFormat 将还原该格式。

span.span: UpdateAutoFormat restores the format.
